Description: This beautiful floor-through 2 Bedroom apartment is loaded with classic charm and period detail, a perfect blend of old and new. The Primary bedroom is en-suite with a walk-in closet, laundry, and a private balcony. The second bedroom is perfect for a den/office/guest room. The open concept kitchen boasts granite countertops, stainless appliances and a center island. A bow front window offers abundant afternoon light. Two ornate decorative fireplaces, terrific ceiling height, central A/C and hardwood flooring throughout complete this lovely home which will be delivered freshly painted! Perfectly located on the South End/Back Bay border moments to Back Bay Station and the trendy restaurants and boutiques located from Tremont to Copley Square!
